segments.text: I suppose you like cinematography and costumes and that sort of stuff ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes , I do . The look of a picture is very important .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I think sound is even more important ! Guns , bombs , sirens--that's what makes a movie exciting !
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: You wouldn't know a good movie even if it bit you on the nose .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: In my book , all a good movie needs is a chase scene and lots of things that blow up .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Enough ! If we don't finish the game , there won't be time for any movies tonight !
segments.speaker: S2
